name: xp-emitter
description: This class is used to provide event emitting functionalities.
author: ExpandJS <dev@expandjs.com> (http://expandjs.com)

scripts.build: npm run build:browserify && npm run build:minify && node noconflict
scripts.build:browserify: browserify index -i expandjs --standalone XPEmitter | derequire > dist/xp-emitter.js
scripts.build:minify: browserify -d index -i expandjs --standalone XPEmitter -p [minifyify --map xp-emitter.min.map --output dist/xp-emitter.min.map] | derequire > dist/xp-emitter.min.js
